DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study identify commercial pulse detection system ( CPDS ) parallel electrocardiogram ( ECG ) record within routine clinical setting , able detect atrial fibrillation sinus rhythm screen patient .
DOC.brief_title: A Digital Non-interventional Atrial Fibrillation ( AF ) Screening Study With Commercial Pulse Detection Systems
DOC.criteria: Adult female male patient diagnose atrial fibrillation sinus rhythm disease history Patients decision record ECG make per investigator 's routine treatment practice Signed informed consent Patients participate investigational program intervention outside routine clinical practice
